title: MIT Professor Gang Chen Says Misunderstanding Lay at Root of U.S. Case
sub_head: Federal prosecutors dropped charges last week, a year after accusing the professor of hiding ties to China
body:
Witnesses started poking some holes in the governmentâ€™s case against Gang Chen, a Massachusetts Institute of Technology professor accused of hiding his ties to China, soon after his arrest in January 2021, interviews and a review of related documents show, a year before prosecutors decided last week to drop criminal charges against him.
In an interview on Tuesday, Mr. Chen said he believed law-enforcement officials had miscalculated in bringing his case and some similar ones, in part because they are unfamiliar with how scientists work.
